WorkItem.Description:
4.0.13.0b running in Safari on a Mac
Â 
Shift-left-clicking the diamond on a gear/gem/reforge combination in the comparison pane sets a blue triangle, as before.  However, with 4.0.13.0b, it appears that doing the same thing again no longer removes the blue triangle.  I've tried various other key combinations, but none of them appear to remove the blue triangle either.
